page.title: 11Lacock Spring Fair
page.content: The{Spring Fair}was in Lacock and there were{maypole dancers}in the playground. All the teachers organised it and the money was for the {school fund.} There was a{horse race out of chairs and you had to throw a rubber dice and if your horse was the number that the dice rolled on then your horse had to move one square. The horse that finished first won 30p. If you wanted to have a go it was 20p. The{Spring Fair}is held every year. There are some{stalls}with books and plants and things. There was a table with a{bottle of sweets}and you had to guess how many sweets were in the bottle. Lisa Gainey won them all because she guessed the amount of sweets there were.
